name: Hubble's Loop
description:
Hubble's Loop is a speed runner mini game made for Ludum Dare 47.

Controls: 

  • WASD - Move
  • Space  - Jump
  • R - Rest Character at Spawn / Checkpoint
  • 1-9 Number Keys - Mouse Sensitivity

My first game jam after a couple of months learning unity.
When I think of loop I think of jumping quests and looping back to a checkpoint or the beginning when you mess up a jump.
I took this idea and speed running and tried to combine them into a game.
I Hope you enjoy playing it, and try to get the fastest time!

My Record: 10:11:05    || Deaths: 12
